website_summaries.verdict: A larger supply of protein powder that uses a strict plant-based protein formula.
pros: Protein powder is derived from split peas, making it more hypoallergenic and easily soluble in many different types of drinks and dishes
Does not leave any kind of aftertaste after dissolving
cons: Chocolate flavoring may take some time to get used to

customer_reviews.title: It is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have taken the time to go and write a review on something. As a gluten and lactose intolerant cross fitter, this protein is BY FAR the best I have ever had. The consistency is great and even works with just water or milk. Tastes like vanilla pancake batter. It is the smoothest, non gritty, best tasting protein.. and for that price? It's a no-brainer. Very fortunate to have stumbled upon it.
customer_reviews.author: SMDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use the powder to up the protein level in my vegetable soup. It doesn’t interfere with the taste like other products I’ve tried. I hate sounding like Goldilocks, but I’ve found that whey protein makes the soup too sweet and the hemp too bitter. This is just right.
customer_reviews.author: LabLady

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was allergic to whey protein, so I decided to try other options. My husband was great and did a lot of research and discovered that peas have a ton of protein and pea protein was highly recommended for people who had trouble with whey. So after reading other reviews, I decided to take a chance. I do have to say, I mix this in with another chocolate meal replacement shake, so I can't speak to its taste on it's own, but I will say it really enhances the chocolate richness of my regular shake. This is one of the only ways I get protein and I'm glad I ordered it. I will definitely be sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace & Olive's MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Contains FODMAPs! Can make intestinal issues worse!!
customer_reviews.text: At the endorsement of Dr Wentz I purchased this. It tastes great. I put a spoonful of the chocolate in a cup of yogurt and it was such a fun snack:-) but if you are off FODMAPs this will not be good for you. I am so surprised that she recommends this since so many people with Hashimoto have a problem with high FODMAP. Now I will save to use for family that do not have an issue with FODMAPs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, easy to mix, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've been making whey protein shakes my whole life -- switched to pea protein to put into fresh juices. This is tasty, mixes well, and isn't too expensive. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I stir 1/2 a serving into my oatmeal 2-3 times per week.  My fingernails have never been stronger.
customer_reviews.text: I have had brittle fingernails for most of my life. I started to use Naturade Plant Based Protein to help recover from surgery. I have used two containers and have been pleasantly surprised at how strong and flexible my fingernails have become over two months.
customer_reviews.author: Madras

customer_reviews.title: From YUCK to YUM
customer_reviews.text: The first time I mixed with water and powder fell on my hand, so I tasted it...ew it tasted like soap or metal-ish tasting... So the next time I mixed with my Almond milk, added kale and it was delicious! I've tried just almond milk and its great too! I have so many food allergies so I've tried different protein powders and to my surprise this wasn't grainy! Mixes well, you just have to keep stirring (easier if you want to dirty your blender but who wants to wash more dishes?) I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Cholly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This stuff says its vanilla flavored. I dont think they have ever tasted vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Emily LBW

customer_reviews.title: Yummy thick smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great chocolate smoothie! I love the thickness that it produces with the 2 scoops, however I prefer the vanilla flavor (hey, I'm a bona fide chocoholic, so take that into consideration). I add fruit and powdered quinoa and enjoy my superfood protein shake! So glad I found this...thanks to all of you that are honest in your reviews! I did NOT notice a strong pea flavor, but that's just my tastebuds...hope that helps! :)
customer_reviews.author: caribbean arteest

customer_reviews.title: This product is difficult to find in local stores
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder to make shakes for my breakfast and lunch almost every day. It is gluten, soy, egg, peanut,corn, and dairy free. I have not found any other protein powders that are this specific. Also, it tastes great, which is most important of all. I have purchased it at times from a local store, but sometimes they run out, just when I need it! It is also less expensive from Amazon and the auto ship is very convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: bunny16

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great in a smoothie
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm trying to add more protein and green leafies into my diet, so I thought I'd try amoothies even though I'm not a smoothies person...tried this protein powder because I'm also trying to avoid whey and soy proteins. I mix 1 scoop with spinach, almond milk, frozen blueberries and a bit of Greek yogurt and blend it up... YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. It tastes great! I put it in smoothies and juices or sometimes I just throw it in with some skim milk and have a quick snack on my way out. It fills me up and I love that it is organic. I've gone through several of these containers and I will continue buying them as long as they sell them.
customer_reviews.author: NattyNat

customer_reviews.title: Chunky and yucky
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. But I really don’t like the taste and it has a chunkier texture.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have ordered it numerous times. I make a shake every morning with 2 scoops, 1 cup frozen berries and 1 cup of coconut/almond milk - so yummy. It stays with me for hours and love that it does not have soy or whey. Great for the Virgin Diet and so much better tasting than the Virgin Diet Protein Powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty...

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this powder is good. I bought the vanilla, but I usually add some type of fruit to it. My only complaint is that the texture is a little gritty, but that seems to be very common with pea protein powders. I can live with the texture because its worth it to me to have a protein source that is dairy, soy and gluten-free.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when looking for lactose-free protein!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my morning protein shakes. I wanted something that was lactose free and this was perfect. And this size lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pea Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is the second supply of this product that I have ordered. I use it as a post workout supplement. While the serving size says 2 scoops I only use 1 as a single scoop still has 10g of protein. The powder mixes well in 16 oz of water and has a good taste. Downside of the product is that if you follow the serving size then there are only 12 servings per container. That is way I only use half the serving size, to extend the life of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: This protein powder can't be beat.  Don't waste your money on the other high-dollar marketed brands.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many protein powders over the years and this one definitely tops the list...and you can't be the price. My morning go-to smoothie consists of (1) scoop of chocolate Naturade Pea Protein powder, (1) scoop of vanilla Naturade Pea Protein powder and (1) Tbsp PB2 powdered peanut butter. Delicious! The Naturade Pea Protein powders keeps my sugar levels stable throughout the morning and curbs my appetite until lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Criswell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use the vanilla for mostly baking. Protein bars or pancakes. Occassionally will make a fruit smoothie with it but mostly use chocolate one for that. Love that this product has no soy, no gluten- two big no no's for me. Started using this over a year ago and it's the only protein powder we buy now.
customer_reviews.author: iluvbeingmama

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm going to stick to whey.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but not enough to buy it again. I was thinking about switching to a veggie protein powder. I like to add protein powder to my morning smoothie and this one was just too pasty. The serving size calls for two scoops but two scoops was just too overwhelming for me. I didn't hate it, it just wasn't good enough to bother with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walrus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service & product!
customer_reviews.text: The service was excellent, price good, and product exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I mix it with vanilla almond milk, it's pretty tasty. I was weary because protein powders aren't exactly known for their taste. But I'm happy with is. I can not have dairy or soy so it was hard finding something that I could use for my protein, since I do not eat meat.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Vanilla has good taste; blends well in blender; mixes well with other tastes in smoothies. Since it is not calcium fortified, it is not a problem for my history of kidney stones. Cons: sodium content, Would anybody notice if it had 10 or 20 percent less sodium?
customer_reviews.author: kite flyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning for my breakfast--I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great supplement, especially if you don't want to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great supplement, especially if you don't want to eat soy. It makes a great shake and the texture is not gritty.
customer_reviews.author: bunny16

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This Vegan Protein Powder is great! It dissolves in juice perfectly and no after taste. Try this with a mix of orange juice, frozen pineapple, fresh banana. (Hmmmm Good) I cannot find this locally in Phoenix AZ. I've checked Sprouts, Trader Joes, Whole Foods and not one of them carry this Protein Powder. That's fine because it is cheaper through Amazon. I received it within 2 days. I have never had any problems when I order from Amazon. Will order this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: SHARDALE

customer_reviews.title: Pea protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Dear Sir: I liked the pea protein drink although I did not get too much energy as I had hoped but it did taste great!!! Thank you. Sally T
customer_reviews.author: S.T

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the mornings to make my fruit smoothies. I love the taste it enhances the flavor of fruits or vegs. This is the first one that I have gotten that makes everything taste good. It has gone above my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Only pea protein that I like - usually they are way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Only pea protein that I like - usually they are way too sweet, and taste awful. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: OK but not worth buying twice
customer_reviews.text: It was okay but had a bit of a "tastes like peas" flavor - good alternative to whey proteins but, since I'm not dairy free, I'll go back to my whey protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Durkin

customer_reviews.title: BEST Protein Drink Mix!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the BEST proteins I've had in a long time. The flavor is GREAT! I even make protein bars with this it's sooooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mimmie

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting this product or getting seller to respond!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a big supply of this product - 30 NATURADE chocolate protein powders 20 on one occasion and 10 on another. Received ZERO. Seller NEVER responded to me. I ordered other chocolate protein powders since I was unable to get NATURADE and received them without any problem. As far as taste PLANT FUSION was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting I have found. Great in smoothies with a banana and cherries!
customer_reviews.author: R  Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when starting a food program that included protein shakes. I had never had one before so wasn't sure what to expect. I experimented with a few other varieties but came back to using this one full time as we really like this particular mix.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Only product for dieting that curbs your appetite. Mix in blender with fresh spinach, blueberries nutritious and good tasting. Ad almond peanut butter if want more protein. With water and ice cubes, very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it blends
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it blends, taste is good, but not strong chocolate, I add a little extra cacao powder and vanilla. Have bought again and will continue to do so
customer_reviews.author: Lala Naidu

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and was surprised at how great it tastes. Works great in banana smoothies. Hey, I even got my dad to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Cady Daemi

customer_reviews.title: the taste not so much
customer_reviews.text: well the price was phenominal, and after reading the reviews i felt compelled to give it a go....needless to say I was not impressed nor was my boyfriend and he isnt that picky when it comes to shake proteins.. we honestly enjoy the taste of bio-chems protein thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Buy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this stuff all the time! It tastes great and there is so many good things about it, all the good ingredients! I try to mix it up,get this and then a hemp protein powder. This is still my all time favorite, it always makes my smoothies taste just THAT much better.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Thurman

customer_reviews.title: It tasted almost like a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: It tasted almost like a milkshake! I gave it 4 stars since, I have been getting away from the protien powders and eating more actual protein breakfasts like eggs and yogurt. Its a good alternative to milk based protein powders that made me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Katestars328

customer_reviews.title: Tasty quick dissolving vegetable based protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder. Mixes easily & tastes great. I like chocolate flavor best.
customer_reviews.author: Echism

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge advocate of using vegetable based protein in my morning shake versus the whey and soy based proteins that are not as nutritious and healthy. This protein is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: LC Narco

customer_reviews.title: Not at all natural - chemical aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I bought Naturade Pea Protein based on the positive reviews and "All Natural" claim. This product is not "all natural". It tasted at first a little like a McDonalds vanilla shake, but there was a chemical aftertaste. So I read the ingredients: Pea Protein Isolate, Fructose, Sunflower Oil, Inulin Fiber (Chicory), Natural Flavors, Xylitol, Erythritol, Maltodextrin, Potassium Citrate, Calcium Phosphate, Medium Chain Triglycerides, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Guar Gum, Carrageenan, Stevia Leaf Extract. I had high hopes for this product, but the chemical aftertaste is so unpleasant I am throwing the whole carton away.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Do anything with it
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste. Digested well. Mixes with most things. Great for protein shakes and cooking. Is without some of the negative sources of other proteins. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: craftydog

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting
customer_reviews.text: Pea protein tastes good and is easy to make. By using 2 scoops as directed you use it up to fast which makes it pricy. It is a little hard to clean off the glass. It doesn't just rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Reba J. Mcgear

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes this one. I prefer the chocolate flavored myself. has less of a chalky taste than the chocolate one though. A bit sweater also
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4020

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Have purchased several times and will continue to do so. Yeepie! Blends and digests well! Great taste!
customer_reviews.author: Lala Naidu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great but I'm hungry 10 minutes later. Tragic.
customer_reviews.author: stormi0822

customer_reviews.title: An excellent vehicle for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: We use this product in our smoothies. We have used whey protein in the past and found we gained weight rather than losing. We have lost weight using the Pea Protein in our smoothies. This product is not always available in the stores and we were able to purchase it here. We like how it mixes in smoothly and doesn't clump. This product is far above what we normally used in the past and we will continue to use this Naturade product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Watzka

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Verdict still out, but everything else was great. Not sure it tastes like a chocolate milkshake, but it is OK,
customer_reviews.author: Sandok

customer_reviews.title: Pea protein just as good as Arbonne shake that is 5 times the price
customer_reviews.text: Pea protein just as good as Arbonne shake that is 5 times the price. Product came to me covered in some kind of highly scented pink candle wax smeared all over the bottom and that was disturbing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Pea Protein on market!
customer_reviews.text: Best Pea Protein on market! Even getting my friends to convert! Tasty and digestible for those of us that can't process whey or other standard protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious product. Delicate vanilla taste. Mixes well in just a shaker. Received it within 2 days. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protein
customer_reviews.text: We chose this protein because we were having issues with Whey protein and rice protein is so chalky. This has a nice smooth texture and great taste. My husband has many stomach issues with proteins and this one has been great for him.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Effective product, taste okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a vegetable based protein powder is good and this product appears to be effective. There is definitely a "pea taste" to it that makes it less desirable than the typical whey-based protein powders, but it's certainly palatable.
customer_reviews.author: rgreen1254

customer_reviews.title: Healthy smoothie !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my morning smoothies ! I use it within an hour of getting up . If your food intolerant I strongly recommend this as a great source of protein!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: tastes great. it keeps me full at lunchtime...mixed with frozen fruit and coconut milk and ice...blended up. yum.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis schitt

customer_reviews.title: Virgin diet followers
customer_reviews.text: The protein shake tastes good and mixes easily. Great for anyone avoiding dairy, wheat, soy, sugar, corn and other not so good for you ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thames

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the taste of this protein powder...it was great in protein and fruit shakes and blended easily. No chalky taste.
customer_reviews.author: itsurplay

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein power
customer_reviews.text: The Naturade Pea Protein Power arrived on time and was packaged well. I love this protein power it has a great flavor and mixes well in my blender with coconut milk or almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Healthy shake
customer_reviews.text: I make a wonderful shake with pea protein, Greek yogurt and Kefir to substitute dinner when I don't feel like cooking. It's very filling and I feel it's a healthy meal.
customer_reviews.author: Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by Dr. Oz..
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good flavor. I use it for an afternoon protein lift. It's not overly sweet like some protein protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: SonomaSue

customer_reviews.title: Service very good.
customer_reviews.text: Review is less than 5 Stars only because i couldnt use the product. Service very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amalfie Luz

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: sugar free, great fiber awesome supplement and a great price on here as well recommend highly thanks so much YUMMM
customer_reviews.author: the queen of sheba

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day, love the taste, not too sweet
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I use it for quick "blend and go" morning shakes. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Pea protein
customer_reviews.text: this product taste good and you can put in any drink or water too. great for on the go and at work outs too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Smih

customer_reviews.title: it has a nice chocolate-ly flavor
customer_reviews.text: It's not gritty, it has a nice chocolate-ly flavor! I'm a repeat orderer!
customer_reviews.author: sayNOtoMOMjeans

customer_reviews.title: great diet food
customer_reviews.text: I begin my day with a shake . I add protein mix, half cup frozen fruit, 30 cal.almond milk, and some chia seeds. I have leftover shake and an apple at lunch and a good supper. Have dropped about 30 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: ann ponte

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were smoother because I have a throats issue. It definitely gave me more energy.
customer_reviews.author: gail thurman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Im a new vegan and my mission is to replace everyday items with vegan alternatives, this pea protein has been just that! It tastes great blended with a cup of almond milk and a cup of ice, and 20g of protein per two scoops, wow!
customer_reviews.author: 34happy-buyer

customer_reviews.title: It is gluten free
customer_reviews.text: And it tastes pretty good and mixes easily. Pea protein is very nutritious but better if you grow your own, I was juicing raw pea sprouts and I don't think this product compares to that but it doesn't claim to. Finding pea seeds for sprouting seems to be a big problem in this area and they are costly online, so I tried this product and liked it. I gave some to my adult daughter and she liked it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect protein for those affected by whey. Tastes good, skin stays clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste very good.
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning with 2 scoops of the protein and it tastes very chalky.It hides the fruit flavor,and definitly does not taste like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Cikacz

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par protein powder
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this product is mild but the ingredient list is subpar. It seems to have some unnatural ingredients and sugars listed and I was looking for a dairy free all natural protein.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Heatherington

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: A tad sweet but good when I have run out of berries to add to my morning shake. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Kat@heart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily as breakfast. Keeps me full for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, not gritty; Mixes easily. Great for low carb dieting and keeps you feeling full. You can mix in cocoa powder and Splenda and make a chocolate flavored shake too.
customer_reviews.author: MDykes

customer_reviews.title: Good for vegans
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla is way better tasting than the chocolate flavor. Helps me on my intermittent fast days.Great to add to smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and excellent choice for blending in with smoothies. My order arrived as expected and I was not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Teolia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tasting product, and it costs considerably more at the health food store, (if you can find it).
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: All around winner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about 10 brands of protein powders; whey, hemp, rice, & pea. They all need a blender to be as smooth as possible & they are all still somewhat chalky. This one tastes the best and gives me as much energy as any other. It spares me the side effects of dairy. The price is reasonable, but I stretch my budget by mixing Naturade Pea Protein with cheaper, worst-tasting brands to improve the flavor of my smoothies. I can pronounce all the ingredients and it is made in the U.S.A. It has more sugar (fructose) than other brands; another reason I combine it with other brands. But if you aren't sensitive to sugars, it's really a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: May be a good product for some
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla flavour is decent tasting but the powder texture is a bit too chalky for my liking. May be a good product for some. Unfortunately, it didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gurdev K.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to my friends all the time
customer_reviews.text: A tasty way to get your protein without getting it from soy or milk products. Ships quickly, too. I recommend it to my friends all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CityKitty

customer_reviews.title: Add frozen fruit, oatmeal, spirulina, powdered quinoa and voila!...superfood protein shake!! YUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great smoothie! I did NOT notice a strong pea flavor, but that's just my tastebuds...hope that helps! :) I love the thickness that it produces with the 2 scoops. I also tried the chocolate flavor, however I prefer the vanilla. I add frozen fruit and quinoa that I turn into powder in my Cuisin.art bullet-thingie...and enjoy my superfood protein shake! So glad I found this...thanks to all of you that are honest in your reviews!
customer_reviews.author: caribbean arteest

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried another pea protein and It doesn't taste good at all. This pea protein tastes great and is easy to drink daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time user!
customer_reviews.text: First time using Pea protein. I wasn't a fan of the taste. It worked well in my shakes and my body seemed to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, just what I was looking for. Will order again. If you are looking for a plant based non whey protein, this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my oatmeal and I also have split this and regular Pea Protein in my shakes. I like the flavor better. I wish they had this in a larger container.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Delcious
customer_reviews.text: The product has a smooth, light, slight coconut taste. It mixes nicely with water or milk (simply by shaking) without requiring a blender.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer consume soy so this is a great alternative product. You have to drink it quickly or it gets rather thick like cement.
customer_reviews.author: BeachTeach

customer_reviews.title: Naturade Pea Protein
customer_reviews.text: This pea Protein had the best taste out of many I have tried. I do find it hard to get and would like a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Little

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with frozen blueberries. It is very filling and tasty! Great for dieters. Good value. It arrived within a few days of my order.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H. Rockafellow

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good for pea protein
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to go pea protein, vanilla flavored is the way to go! I tried this and also a non-flavored pea protein, and this tastes infinitely better! My husband could barely tolerate the non-flavored kind, but he didn't mind this one so much.
customer_reviews.author: alicianr67

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for in a protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: After much research I decided to try Naturade Pea Protein. I wanted a protein powder that had no GMO's, sugars, mixed smoothly and last but not least I wanted it to taste good. I am not disappointed with this product at all. It was everything I was looking for and I highly recommend it. I am on my second canister of Naturade Pea Protein!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this protein mix.
customer_reviews.text: I use blue diamond almond milk in my protein shake and I really enjoy it, I give this protein mix a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lovunia DeVito

customer_reviews.title: This Dring Gave My Husband Staying Power Through The Day
customer_reviews.text: It gave him real staying power through the day, and he really liked it. But I suspect it was a culprit of his bowel irritations and hemmorhoids.
customer_reviews.author: Podkayne

customer_reviews.title: Taste AWFULL
customer_reviews.text: I will stick with my slim fast this was awful tasting ended up giving it away will try other ways to get my soy like milk
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: I am vegan, and needed a form of protein besides soy just for variety of protein sources. As soon as I opened the container, I was stuck with the intensity of sweetness. I 've tried covering it up with other flavors in my smoothies, but the sacchiriny sweetness comes through no matter what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Cost increased $4 in two months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Feb 4th for $13.99. It wasn't amazing, but I thought I'd try it again. Except the price increased to $18. Why? It's not worth $18.
customer_reviews.author: Miko Leona

product_meta.title: Naturade Plant Based Vegan Pea Protein – Vanilla – 15.66 oz
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Vanilla

 • The Naturade research and development team is proud to introduce Naturade Pea Protein. Pea Protein is a natural plant-based protein that is derived from yellow peas (Pisum sativum), also known as “split peas.” This product is highly soluble, easy to digest, hypoallergenic – and it tastes great! Naturade Pea Protein is formulated using only the highest quality pea protein isolate available. Its phenomenal amino acid profile includes nine essential amino acids. Since essential amino acids cannot be synthesized by the human body, they must be supplied by our diets. Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins and are used by our bodies to support our bones, muscles and connective tissues.
• Naturade Pea Protein is all natural and contains no animal by-products, no artificial flavors, no artificial sweeteners and no artificial colors. We use non-GMO pea protein that is 100% gluten-free, cholesterol-free, soy-free and dairy-free. Each great tasting vanilla shake provides an excellent source of vegetable-based protein and is suitable for low-carbohydrate dieters, vegetarians, vegans, children, athletes and anyone needing extra protein in their daily diet.
